body:
Will I get my appeal soon I have sent a couple around 3 or 4 I've waited patiently for another 2 months I still don't have it :(

Please I really wanna come back to this server. Other servers don't have Nexus maps like you guys do. 

Much Thanks

~Soul

title: Appeal

replies.body: Why did you use a hacked client if you "enjoy the maps so much"?
replies.body_tagged: Why did you use a hacked client if you "enjoy the maps so much"?

replies.body: It means I support your appeal, by vouching for you
replies.body_tagged: It means I support your appeal, by vouching for you

replies.body: Just be patient. If you'd like, you can contact a Sr Mod+ about your appeal over Skype.
replies.body_tagged: Just be patient. If you'd like, you can contact a Sr Mod+ about your appeal over Skype.

replies.body: Cause someone was insulting me and was saying I hacked. So I logged out and gave that person what he deserved. Im sorry I just lost control over my anger, thinks he's long gone by now. I've never used a client in a long time, found it kinda pointless.

replies.body: It was up until now I heard new maps had came out but I've never seen them before. The reason why is in the comment section.
